alert.note: Alert for Bath; Estill; Fleming; Menifee; Montgomery; Powell; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 3:28AM EDT until July 01 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Powell County in east central Kentucky... Montgomery County in east central Kentucky... Bath County in east central Kentucky... East central Estill County in east central Kentucky... Menifee County in east central Kentucky... South central Fleming County in east central Kentucky... Southwestern Rowan County in east central Kentucky... * Until 400 AM EDT. * At 327 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Odessa to Howards Mill to near Westbend, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Owingsville around 330 AM EDT. Jeffersonville around 335 AM EDT. Marshall around 340 AM EDT. Stanton around 345 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Campsites in the Indian Creek area of the Daniel Boone National Forrest and Rogers Chapel. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bath; Estill; Fleming; Menifee; Montgomery; Powell; Rowan
